website_summaries.verdict: High-quality 3-piece luggage set that is both durable and elegant at a low price.
pros: Well rated for quality and value
Suitcases nest inside each other for easy storage
Smallest size perfect for a carry-on
Multi-directional wheels glide smoothly with little effort using telescoping handle
Navigates long treks on cobblestone streets without a hitch
Durable and stays in shape after international travel
Luggage wears well, especially for being soft-shell design
cons: Some dislike lack of hand grip on bottom to ease loading and unloading

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: I could move this with just one arm. Swivels smoothly and effortlessly! I’m 5’4 130 lbs female
customer_reviews.author: Woody Flowers

customer_reviews.title: Great suitcase! We brought ours to Italy and trecked ...
customer_reviews.text: Great suitcase! We brought ours to Italy and trecked across cobble stone streets and drug it a HUGE distance from our hotel in Venice to the train stop in order to make it to our next destination and they have held up very well through some rough treatment! They are also very light-weight for those who are flying and want to conserve poundage.
customer_reviews.author: G J.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent customer service!
customer_reviews.text: The 28” luggage of the original set unfortunately had a quality issue. The 2 smaller luggage withstood the first interstate trip and remain to be in great condition. Coolife’s customer support center had been very helpful and offered solutions for the damaged 28” luggage, all viable. Since the luggage will be needed for more travels in the near future, we opted for “replacement.” Within a few days, we received the replacement. There have been no new issues so far, and we hope it will withstand all future trips. Excellent customer service! Hats off to the people resource of Coolife.
customer_reviews.author: M Nayan

customer_reviews.title: The small bag worked perfect for a carry on and I checked the medium ...
customer_reviews.text: Just used the small and medium sized bags for a trip. The small bag worked perfect for a carry on and I checked the medium bag. I was very impressed with them. They’re good quality bags that feel very durable. They roll very easily and the 4 rotating wheels make it very nice when rolling the bag. The blue accents also are nice and make it easier to identify your bag at baggage claim.
customer_reviews.author: ocenforcer29

customer_reviews.title: Very Impressive!
customer_reviews.text: We received these today and have looked them over carefully. The quality seems better than that of luggage that we looked at at a much higher price. The material seems very durable, and the luggage has great reinforcement on the corners and the bottom. We are very impressed. The only negative is that they will NOT fit inside each other unless two of the wheels are sticking out. We did not want to force them so ended up storing the smallest in the largest one and will store the medium one separately.
customer_reviews.author: Moppy

customer_reviews.title: Easy rider
customer_reviews.text: Took two of these suitcases on a international vacation and back and I love the way I move around the airport with them with no problems at all. When I got home they were still in top shape
customer_reviews.author: Clinton L.

customer_reviews.title: Great color, darker than I thought by the picture
customer_reviews.text: Great color, darker than I thought by the picture. Almost teal. Sturdy and the wheels glide smoothly. Though they can be nested inside the larger it is a tight fit. It was hard to get the wheels inside. Overall I love the set!
customer_reviews.author: Leanna

customer_reviews.title: WORTH IT! Seriously!
customer_reviews.text: I know how important these reviews were for me so here is my opinion.. Worth the money.. we had no issues with the luggage as we traveled thru 4 airports , and a cruise line .. Luggage held up with my over stuffing abilities, the wheels worked great - they spin and definately a plus! The color (black and red set) is great, no fading. Tons of pockets and handles on two sides for ease of picking up. Also, they store inside one another too.. Check them out!
customer_reviews.author: busymometc

customer_reviews.title: Nice!!
customer_reviews.text: This luggage is gorgeous! The pic of the blue doesn’t capture its true tone, which is more of a unique deep teal. The wheels have very smooth movement..if you have little kids, watch out or they’ll be suitcase surfing all over the house! Lol Sturdy material, easy glide retractable handles and solid structure. Perfect sizes for when you need small, medium, or large capacity luggage. It’s a little hard to nest them, but it’s doable and not a big deal.
customer_reviews.author: Pamela Richards

customer_reviews.title: Well Made and Easy to See On Baggage Claim
customer_reviews.text: The three piece set was bought to replace a couple of well used bags . We always had yellow flagging to find our bags on the bag claim, but with the black/blue we purchased, it is easy to distinguish our bags from all the other plain black ones. We really like the sizes, and the armor on the edges will help with the usual wear and tear from baggage handlers.
customer_reviews.author: River Rat

customer_reviews.title: Do not buy
customer_reviews.text: Absolute junk. The handle broke and sliced my finger on trip one. The bag ripped on trip two. The wheels collapsed and became unusable on trip three. Three strikes and 2 out of three are worthless.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Nice set
customer_reviews.text: They seem to be well built quality luggage. Move around quite nicely. The large piece is quite big with a ton of room. Did not arrive damaged in anyway and for the price you really can’t go wrong. I’m not really fond of the color which I purchased the blue set and it is more like a teal but the upside will be that they will be easy to spot when I go to pick up my luggage at the airport.
customer_reviews.author: Ksd

customer_reviews.title: Quality spinner set at a good price.
customer_reviews.text: Good value for quality spinner luggage set. Granted, we've only had them a couple of months now... but they worked famously over a very long family road trip. Good looking and appear to be well built. I rounded up to 5*... if I could, I would take 1/2 of a star away for not having a grip on the bottom back side (to help stabilize the larger luggage pieces for loading/unloading)... it's not a major issue... but my previous luggage had this feature, and it was a useful one.
customer_reviews.author: George

customer_reviews.title: Hard to put each suitcase inside the other.
customer_reviews.text: Looks great and moves around very smoothly. Only thing I don’t like is it’s extremely hard to put them inside one another. The wheels are in the way and you really have to work to get it inside the other suitcase.
customer_reviews.author: Natalya

customer_reviews.title: Great!!! I love it!
customer_reviews.text: AMAZING luggage! TSA did their best to mess it up! But only a teeny scratch in the end! So smooth and effortless! And man oh man, I can pack the entire closet ;) even the biggest luggage which is huge is perfect size for plane check in without costing you extra but still carries the whole sha-bang! Love it! Great purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Mariieel

customer_reviews.title: So good so far.
customer_reviews.text: I’ll repost when I use them. Seem good in quality and rolling around. Wish there were more pockets inside but it’ll due.
customer_reviews.author: Molly T

customer_reviews.title: Great for the Price !
customer_reviews.text: So far I have really liked it ! I took the medium case to the Bahamas on a cruise and to Orlando for 10 days and it held up just fine. I used the small case to travel for work a couple times and it has been great as a carry on.
customer_reviews.author: Clint

customer_reviews.title: ONLY NEGATIVE THE CLOTH LIKE HANDLES ON THE SIDE THOUGH STURDY OVER TIME I ...
customer_reviews.text: IMPRESSED MADE THE TRIP NO DAMAGE PREFECT I AM OVERLY PLEASE I PURCHASED THEM IF YOU ARE LOOKING i WOULD SUGGEST BUY NOW... ONLY NEGATIVE THE CLOTH LIKE HANDLES ON THE SIDE THOUGH STURDY OVER TIME I CAN SEE THEM STARTING TO LOOK LIKE POO FROM TSA AND OWNER HANDS BEING DIRTY OR SWEATY ECT...WE WILL SEE THOUGH FOR NOW 5 STARS
customer_reviews.author: Rikitikitavi

customer_reviews.title: Nice but a couple of things I wish I had paid attention to when ordering
customer_reviews.text: The luggage is a very nice quality and the color makes the bags easy to recognize when your bags are on the luggage track. They held up really well on my recent trip. A couple of things that makes me give only 3 stars is that the large bag doesn't have a handle on the bottom to make lifting easier and the supposed carry on is definitely too big for carry on. The wheels make the bag stand too tall although the bag itself is proper sized. Airlines are requiring smaller bags these days for under seat placement. I will have to purchase a smaller carry on now.
customer_reviews.author: Kim

customer_reviews.title: True lightweight and handsome
customer_reviews.text: Very nice set. Packaging smelled heavily of chemicals, hope that goes away from the luggage itself. Very lightweight, and material looks like nylon, so should wear and tumble at least medium well in airline travel. I plan to get another set.
customer_reviews.author: GJ Simmons

customer_reviews.title: I absolutely love this luggage
customer_reviews.text: I absolutely love this luggage. The quality of the fabric is strong. Used the medium sized piece for a Thanksgiving vacation...It held up splendidly. Will be using the entire set for an upcoming cross country trip......Will update after airline usage.
customer_reviews.author: alfreda f.

customer_reviews.title: A bad back’s best friend
customer_reviews.text: Attractive color is easy to spot on the luggage carousel. Roll with very minimal effort in any direction.
customer_reviews.author: Kristen Hendricks

customer_reviews.title: I was a little worried what they would look like because they were so cheap but I was very ...
customer_reviews.text: We just came home from Disney and I order these right before we left . I was a little worried what they would look like because they were so cheap but I was very pleased when I opened them they are high quality!! I will be ordering another set
customer_reviews.author: Erin

customer_reviews.title: Not bad, need work
customer_reviews.text: The luggage looks good, and feels sturdy enough, but there are some improvements that should be made. You should include a handle on the bottom of the luggage to help pick it up and put on the stands in hotel rooms or in the trunk or the back of your car. Also, the zippers don't seem to work as well as they should, it's hard to get them around the corners of the baggage. We've just used them a couple of times so maybe the zippers will loosen up, but I do miss the handle on the bottom of the luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Gramps

customer_reviews.title: Great value.
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this luggage set to anyone who is looking for a very durable elegant travel set. I got it for my mother and she got great compliments on her trip. She's so happy with it because of its quality and weight.
customer_reviews.author: Abena Bamfo

customer_reviews.title: Very Happy With My Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Very happy with my purchase. The set met my expectations. I took a week long trip to Rhode Island. It survived the toss and slamming that goes on when the airport workers are the luggage around. Wheels and handles still intact.
customer_reviews.author: fashionwitta

customer_reviews.title: I did not realize how bad the old luggage was till we needed new fairly ...
customer_reviews.text: I did not realize how bad the old luggage was till we needed new fairly fast, getting the new set called ( Cool life) we are very pleased, thanks for making our trip much easier. I will also thank Amazon for doing just what they said, and somewhat quickly!!
customer_reviews.author: Dennis Martin

customer_reviews.title: BROKEN WHEEL 4 Month after purchase and having problems getting a refund
customer_reviews.text: Purchase this luggage set in February 2019 and 4 months later the wheel broke. Luggage will not roll easily. Tips over easily now with broken wheel. Tried to return it thru Amazon/Kohl center and it has last date to return March 25, 2019. This luggage has a 2 year warranty and Amazon tried to contact Coollite Luggage on the phone and no answer. Can Coollite Luggage let me know how to get a return.
customer_reviews.author: Janet T Larson

customer_reviews.title: Coolife Luggage 3 Piece Set Suitcase Spinner Softshell lightweight (blue+sliver)
customer_reviews.text: Wow, this is some really good luggage with a great price. You cannot beat the price I paid a $139 for three pieces of luggage the local stores in my area are asking that for one piece. This luggage is sturdy, well-constructed, and durable. I went through six or seven different airports in two weeks. I did not lose a wheel I had no dents or broken handles; everything was great. However, I do recommend buying darker sets. I bought two the black for my son and myself and the green for my wife and daughter. The black color fared better in the airports the lighter color got pretty dirty, but nothing a little soap and water cannot fix.
customer_reviews.author: Marlon Williams

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy it
customer_reviews.text: The large luggage the front pocket ripped right at the seam the first trip I took with it!!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love our luggage
customer_reviews.text: I purchased this luggage set for my children and I to use when we take trips. My youngest son loves the smallest suitcase and it is the perfect size for him to pack his items. My oldest son has taken over the medium suitcase which provides him with more than enough room to pack a week’s worth of clothes. I use the largest to pack my clothes as well as any other items we may need and still have room to spare. It’s lightweight and easy to maneuver. I also love how they fit into each other when not being used to save on storage space.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Hoping it will be better than this
customer_reviews.text: I used the large one on ONE trip and it has already ripped. Not sure if it will make it thru more. Hoping it will be better than this.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage for the price!
customer_reviews.text: The color of the luggage is very nice, not a blaring purple , but a nice deep purple. I do have a couple of issues with the luggage itself. Some of the zippers are a little difficult to maneuver. Perhaps they will ease with more usage, since we’ve only used the set once? I’ll have to see. Also, the wheels don’t seem as sturdy as some of the other brands that we’ve seen in stores. Again, they worked well when we used them. I just hope they hold up for a few years. Too early to tell !
customer_reviews.author: Patricia C.

customer_reviews.title: Great Set
customer_reviews.text: We used these on a road trip and they are lightweight. I did not know what the zippered liner was useful for till we were packing up to leave. We put the dirty clothes on the bottom, zipped it up, and put the clean clothes on top. Perfect solution! The rollers were so smooth and made it easy to take our luggage where we needed to. We used to use several bags on our trip and we only used 2 of these and all our items fit well. So happy I bought them.
customer_reviews.author: REbecca Saxon

customer_reviews.title: At least 30 trips and going strong
customer_reviews.text: I originally bought this set in April 2018 for our Aruba vacation. I don't care for the hard shell and didn't want to break the bank on luggage. My husband, who is a frequent flyer, liked it so much that he started using the 2 smaller sizes on his trips. It is lightweight but glides easily and quickly through the airport. There is only one little snag (not rip) and my husband did that trying to force space in the overhead bin. He caught it on the metal closure tab. It definitely has held up to all the airport beatings. The best part is that they all fit inside each other for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: -Mimi-

customer_reviews.title: Great Option for Budget Travel
customer_reviews.text: We have been using my old luggage set from 2001. That set is on its last legs and I didn't want to spend a fortune on new luggage since we honestly don't travel that often. I ordered these for a last minute business trip my hubby was taking to the Philippines and we are very pleased. They held up great, still look new, even after two international flights, and they maneuver very well. The perfect investment for people who don't want to spend a fortune on luggage.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica

customer_reviews.title: Luggage preformed outstanding
customer_reviews.text: We did a two week trip to Europe and this luggage held up wonderfully! Easy to take thru train stations; loading and unloading on and off buses; and did great at the airports! The purple color was easy to pick out on the airport turnstile! We had this luggage for four months. Highly recommend!
customer_reviews.author: Linda, AZ

customer_reviews.title: Nice but cannot nest for storage.
customer_reviews.text: I bought these because they were advertised as light weight which is a plus when traveling internationally. The handles stay in place and roll easily. They came nested but for the life of me I cannot them to re-nest. I wanted them to save space. They must have been nest for shipment by machine. If someone knows the trick, I would gladly like to know
customer_reviews.author: California Shopper

customer_reviews.title: Beautiful set
customer_reviews.text: Love these. They nest very well. I’m a little concerned about durability, however the price for all three was hard to beat. I’ve taken the midsize on a cross county flight and it held up. Crossing my fingers this set lasts a while. Only thing is I wish it was expandable. I didn’t realize that until I opened everything. Not a deal breaker. Just nice to have if I need it.
customer_reviews.author: Emmye C Frye

customer_reviews.title: We were not happy. Karen Bushea @ kbfb1975@gmail
customer_reviews.text: When we got off the plane to collect our luggage off the plane.... the large suitcases' front flap was torn leaving a hole in it. We were not happy. Karen Bushea @ kbfb1975@gmail.com I have pictures... where do i send them
customer_reviews.author: Karen Bushea

customer_reviews.title: Very sturdy handles and nice looking
customer_reviews.text: All 3 suitcases were very attractive and the handles very sturdy. Even though there was a chemical smell, it was no worse than new clothing and dissipated very quickly. None now. The handles on all suitcases come up to the same level which will help when managing multiple suitcases. Wheels roll like a dream.
customer_reviews.author: Lee

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Love these, love how they nest for storage (hint, you have to put them inside each other every other way... wheels of inside one toward handle of outside one). Was bummed that the first trip with them ended up with a busted zipper... not sure if it is durability or crew mishandling...
customer_reviews.author: Becca

customer_reviews.title: Nice color, a pain to store
customer_reviews.text: Love the colors and they seem durable so far. My major issue is storing them when not in use. Most sets can fit inside each other easily, but not these. You have to flip them upside down to fit the smaller bags inside the bigger bag and really force the wheels in. It's a struggle.
customer_reviews.author: lpitts718

customer_reviews.title: I have been using it on international travel for past 3 times and it held up good
customer_reviews.text: I have been using it on international travel for past 3 times and it held up good. Update after a year of use: I have 6 (two sets) of these suitcases. The zipper on one of them just broke. I am trying to contact the seller for warranty but seems like their website says to contact Amazon. Not sure how to go about it. I'll update my review once I find out. It seems like decent set with good reviews but not sure why there is no way to contact the seller. I am lowering my review from 5 star to 2 star
customer_reviews.author: Mr. Kazi

customer_reviews.title: Well made great price.
customer_reviews.text: I have used on a recent trip, I checked the large bag and it held up fine with airline baggage handlers. It's easy to handle and rolls well. Great luggage for the price.
customer_reviews.author: mark t.

customer_reviews.title: Great product for a good value.
customer_reviews.text: Ordered this luggage set specifically for a cruise and having a set with 4 wheels on each made travelling through crowded cruise ports and airports was so much easier. The only con is the packing them back together for storage was a little difficult.
customer_reviews.author: Sara Niethe

customer_reviews.title: good value and good quality and lightweight, with spinners!
customer_reviews.text: I was surprised these were such good value and good quality and lightweight! We looked for spinning luggage for a while and I'm glad we selected this package. It's so much lighter than our older luggage, and the spinning casters are nice because you don't have to hold the weight all the time, plus the kids can help us push them through the airport. These have just enough features, but no useless bells and whistles that you won't actually use. The largest suitcase is pretty big. These luggage sizes seem to be just right for my family. Very pleased with my purchase!
customer_reviews.author: I'm no electrician

customer_reviews.title: Handle issues but overall good
customer_reviews.text: The suitcases are exactly as pictured and work great. The only issue is the retractable handles. I've tried everything I could to get the middle sized suitcase's handle to come out but it only comes out about three to four inches. That's the only issue, and it's just an inconvenience.. I hate using that size now because i literally have to bend over to drag it anywhere.. and I'm short. The other two are great!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: I can't believe the great value
customer_reviews.text: One of the main reasons I bought this luggage set was that i could return it for free. It seemed too good a deal and I was skeptical. But I am extremely pleased. I chose purple so that they would be easy to spot at the baggage claim. They passed my first three "tests" with an A+. They roll easily, the zippers operate without catching and the handle goes up and down smoothly. I'm very happy.
customer_reviews.author: Patricia Michaud

customer_reviews.title: Not recommended for frequent travelers
customer_reviews.text: Love the color and the super fast delivery at an affordable price. Have only used them once on a car trip. The pull out handle is very flimsy and somewhat short. The large suitcase has tipped over on many occasions (how I packed it may be a cause) more frequently than I am used to. Still getting used to the multi-directional wheels as well.
customer_reviews.author: Diana

customer_reviews.title: Good Buy!!
customer_reviews.text: The luggage made it to Orlando and back still looking brand new. The only issue was the handle was cracked didn't notice till we arrived. This is the first time we used the luggage. I am not sure how this will look after 2 more trips just a bit concerned. Otherwise awesome luggage.
customer_reviews.author: ItzBabyRuth

customer_reviews.title: Traveling with my Coolife Luggage set
customer_reviews.text: I used this set on my trip to Dubai last week. It held up great with all the transferring of luggage. It met the weight allowance on Emerits Airline. The 4 wheel drive on the luggage was excellent in maneuvering through the vacation. Others on the trip with me plan to go home and purchase this set. I plan on traveling to many other destinations with this set. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: AngelBev

customer_reviews.title: Satisfied
customer_reviews.text: I was very satisfied for the quality of this product when receiving my package. A three piece set online for $140, I did not expect the greatest quality, but I did not have any luggage for my trip to Tennessee in a couple weeks so I figured I would try it out. Upon receiving I checked it all over. It was packaged well. All zippers worked, no damage to any pieces and they seem durable. We will see how they hold up after this trip, but for right now, I am very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly

customer_reviews.title: Nice.
customer_reviews.text: We just got this luggage for our son who is going to love in Portugal for a couple of years. Not sure yet on how durable they are, as they are still new. They are roomy, but I wish they were expandable, they are NOT, so keep that in mind when ordering this set. The color is nice, and the material seems durable.
customer_reviews.author: K. Fullmer

customer_reviews.title: What a deal!!!
customer_reviews.text: It was a great deal. Three suitcases for only $120. I was surprised by the quality materials; chains were smooth and finishing was excellent. Honestly I thought I would get something flimsy but I was pleasantly surprised. I took them for international travel and they held up very well.
customer_reviews.author: Tander Shivley

customer_reviews.title: Good price, nice luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Luggage set was perfectly packed in one piece, this should also help with the storage. All the handling with the luggage set is very easy and convenient. They look very nice and durable, the handlers are very strong. The sizes just fits with to what we are looking for and as was described on Amazon. The small luggage is carried on and the other two have size to check in. We like the pockets in front.
customer_reviews.author: Taubi63

customer_reviews.title: 29" Luggage Piece TOO Large
customer_reviews.text: I am totally confused why luggage sets are now including a piece that is too large to use to travel. If you packed this bag for flying you would probably always to be over weight, plus extremely difficult to manage when traveling. The bags themselves were nice but I didn't want to keep the entire set because of the need to store a huge suitcase I would never use. I would have been happy with the carry on and the 25" piece.
customer_reviews.author: Kentucky

customer_reviews.title: This set appears to be a steal....
customer_reviews.text: Jury's still out on durability, but from the initial looks of the set, it seems to be well made. It's fashionable, roomy, and, more importantly, lightweight. The casters are smooth as silk, and the handles pull up and go down with no resistance, so far. For the price, the set appears to be a real steal.
customer_reviews.author: gt

customer_reviews.title: Hard to beat price and features.
customer_reviews.text: Best value for the price. Very spacious and durable. I looked over 2 days to find for wheeled spinners for this price. 3 pieces gives you lots of space.
customer_reviews.author: Vincent B

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage for travel
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the purple set and it's a really nice color. Actually looks better in person as I was worried it would be to dark of a color, but not at all. All 3 pieces arrived in perfect condition. Swivels smoothly and effortlessly. When not in use, all 3 fit nicely together for easy storage. Very happy with this set!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Love the color, excellent craftsmanship and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: We have t used this luggage set yet, but we are using it for the first time on 12/31 on our NYE trip to Nashville. When I was researching luggage, I didn’t want to spend a lot of money on luggage that was just going to get thrown around. This set had excellent reviews, so I pulled the trigger. I absolutely love the color (got the turquoise), and it seems to be very lightweight and easy to maneuver. It does not expand, but it is very deep (hence the back scratcher in the pic) and has lots of storage. Can’t wait to use!
customer_reviews.author: DARIN

customer_reviews.title: Great price and great quality
customer_reviews.text: My son took the middle one on a trip out of state. He said he was very happy with the way it rolled and it fit perfectly in the overhead compartment. I needed to get new ones because my old ones were so old. The price is great for the set of 3.
customer_reviews.author: Sandra H.

customer_reviews.title: Very impressed so far.
customer_reviews.text: So far so good. I bought this 3 piece set for my mom before she came to visit me. They seem to be made well and good quality. I helped her with the luggage from baggage claim and was impressed how smoothly they rolled out to the curb and across the bumpy walkway. She’s only had them a couple of days so there is not much more to report.
customer_reviews.author: Anna D.

customer_reviews.title: Wheels are poorly mad
customer_reviews.text: When I got my suitcase set I was super excited by the look and feel. I took the largest of the suitcases on a two week vacation and while I had no issues on the first two legs, the wheel broke on the 3rd Leg of the trip. This was hard as I had to deal with going through major airports and customs and had expected the suitcase to withstand my trip. I love the color but I have had a suitcase that cost way less last a lot longer.
customer_reviews.author: Human Resources Blackbaud Incorporated

customer_reviews.title: It’s worth the purchase
customer_reviews.text: I am very pleased with the suitcases. They are sturdy and durable. I traveled on Friday and used them, they were stuffed to capacity. The zippers did not break or jam. The trains were not working at the Atlanta airport which means I had to walk miles to my gate, because of the swivele wheels this made the luggage very easy to manuvor through the crowds breeze to carry.
customer_reviews.author: Pleasantchild

customer_reviews.title: EDITED - Customer Service came through!
customer_reviews.text: I was disappointed to see the results after the very first trip taken with this luggage. The front zipper was completely torn. ** Within a day or two of posting this review Coolife customer service was in touch offering a refund or replacement. We opted for replacement and received the new piece promptly. Very satisfied with the resolution!
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer

customer_reviews.title: Pretty and durable
customer_reviews.text: These bags look study and are very elegant looking. The wheels are sturdy and don't feel flimsy, I can't comment on long-term durability yet, maybe after several flights / baggage checking, I can comment on that. Otherwise, these bags are nicely package, and well designed.
customer_reviews.author: Anelley

customer_reviews.title: Happy Happy Joy Joy...had good luck with this purchase so far.
customer_reviews.text: I was a bit worried after reading some reviews but I’ve had a good experience with this luggage. I’ve used them on four trips & they have held up fine. I was particularly concerned about airport handling but they have come out unscathed so far.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and good product
customer_reviews.text: These are 360 deg rotating wheels and a they are very light weight, I bought an other set.. I like it and I was able to to stuff a lot of things for a long vacation
customer_reviews.author: Ramya

customer_reviews.title: Did Not Use.
customer_reviews.text: These looked great on the Amazon page. When they arrived they looked even better! The only problem was that we mismeasured our needs for the larger one (just a couple of inches short of our needs).
customer_reviews.author: KKR

customer_reviews.title: good customer service
customer_reviews.text: The color was nice and the customer service was great
customer_reviews.author: Crystal & Jeromy

customer_reviews.title: Good suitcases, but they don’t fit inside each other well.
customer_reviews.text: I haven’t had the opportunity to use them yet, but they seem to be fairly high quality. The smallest one fits inside the largest one easily enough, but beyond that, getting them inside each other would be challenging. The purple ones are a pretty color.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah D

customer_reviews.title: Standard
customer_reviews.text: Standard-type luggage. No frills. Seems well-made. Will post pictures and details once it goes through our rigorous airport screeners/handlers.
customer_reviews.author: nae

customer_reviews.title: Nice Set of Luggage
customer_reviews.text: Nice color and overall the luggage appears nice. I like that it is a 360 spinner. It is a little hard getting all of them back into the large suitcase for storage. A little snug, you just need patience. Looking forward to using when we can travel again.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: They arrived in perfect condition, and they are sturdy
customer_reviews.text: They arrived in perfect condition, and they are sturdy, spacious, nice and the material is not cheap whatsoever. Its definitely worth buying, we don't regret it.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Tago

customer_reviews.title: Very happy!
customer_reviews.text: The first time using my luggage, I had to walk and stand in the rain for a almost 3 hours before boarding my cruise. The bags held up so well AND none of my things on the inside were wet at all. They were so easy to maneuver with the 360 wheels. It’s also easy to store since they can fit inside one another. I’m very satisfied.
customer_reviews.author: Lindsey

customer_reviews.title: I’d buy these again
customer_reviews.text: Took them from one end Of the country to the other and on a cruise and held up amazing! I took all three and they were great. My only complaint is that the big one came with a messed up wheel.
customer_reviews.author: Aubrey

customer_reviews.title: Great quality at a good price
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this luggage for our college bound daughter who will eventually study abroad. Taking the price into consideration, we were very impressed at the quality of materials, design and construction. We truly feel we got a bargain. We’re confident that it will more than hold up well during all her travels.
customer_reviews.author: pdeagle

customer_reviews.title: Three piece luggage set.
customer_reviews.text: Pretty color. Sizes as described. Nest tightly. They are heavier than I expected, and they do not have interior zipper compartments other than the one behind the top of the case. The outside zipper pockets help. I haven’t traveled with them yet
customer_reviews.author: Wish I could send a picture

customer_reviews.title: Too hard to put back inside each other and strong chemical oder
customer_reviews.text: Extremely strong order when I unpacked them. Very hard to separate. Still have not need able to get them back inside of one another. May return unless some one can get these back together, to old to be fixing luggage this tight and now takes too much room in closet ,,,not sure what I will do as husband unit thru box away
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage.
customer_reviews.text: Wow this is great luggage. I have used it on three trips now and it is perfect. It rolls easily. The construction is top-notch. It looks good. The zippers work very well
customer_reviews.author: John Cameron

customer_reviews.title: Worth the money
customer_reviews.text: Arrived as advertised. Haven’t used on a trip but all zippers work and no problems evident
customer_reviews.author: Beverly U.

customer_reviews.title: Love this!
customer_reviews.text: These suitcases do not have a zipper to expand the suitcase, and I wish that it did. We filled this up a little more than it should be filled, and they're a couple of seams that are exposed now.
customer_reviews.author: Allyson Brackett

customer_reviews.title: Good for the price
customer_reviews.text: For the price these suitcases are just fine. They are not really easy to maneuver, and they do get dirty quickly, but for the amazing price that they cost they absolutely get the job done. I did have a problem with them at first, and the company contacted me immediately with strong intentions to fix the problem and make me happy. Their efforts do not go unnoticed and I commend them on their great customer service. They stand behind their products 100%.
customer_reviews.author: Bari H Lehrman

customer_reviews.title: Great looking luggage and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Just got your product going to use it on trip to Mexico we will see how durable they are but looks and able to move around that’s a big thumbs up on my part they look well made and have a ton of space so looking forward on how they hold up on our trip thanks
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: So far so good after 4 flights
customer_reviews.text: So far so good after 4 flights. Seems pretty durable so far. Everything seems pretty solid and no tears or rips anywhere, wheels work great.
customer_reviews.author: Micah Fernandez

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, easy storage
customer_reviews.text: These are great! I've had them for about a year and brought them on many trips. They handle well, are durable, the blue color is nice and easy to spot on a carousel. I really like that they all nest together for easy storage.
customer_reviews.author: Tamar Caplan

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight and sturdy
customer_reviews.text: I just received two sets of the black/blue luggage. It was just as described by the seller and looks very good. They came tightly packed inside each other so re-storing in the same way may be difficult. They are lightweight, glide easily, have sturdy handles and the material and stitching appear to be durable. I will be using them in a few weeks and will update the review if needed.
customer_reviews.author: Karen C

customer_reviews.title: Keeps her from borrowing mine, lol
customer_reviews.text: Purchased these for my sister's birthday and she was in desperate need of some new luggage. She absolutely loved the sizes, and durability. The largest one holds quite a bit. Great sizes and really priced right.
customer_reviews.author: Susanne S.

customer_reviews.title: Lightweight, durable and easy to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Love this luggage set....very lite and easy to maneuver. Recently took a trip and had two other carry bags looped on the handle and it was still very easy to maneuver and saved me time from using the hotel's luggage cart.
customer_reviews.author: Stella

customer_reviews.title: Durable
customer_reviews.text: Have used on one trip to San Juan. A lot of layovers and baggage transfers and the luggage held up very well!!! Lightweight, easy to handle and a lot of room. We are very pleased with this purchase!
customer_reviews.author: Gregory A. Brown

customer_reviews.title: good set of luggage
customer_reviews.text: I really like it. its easy to maneuver and it looks good. I can see how it could get snagged and the fabric could get a run, but so far so good. I've used it a few times with no problems
customer_reviews.author: Barry

customer_reviews.title: Great Luggage Set
customer_reviews.text: Love the three, workable sizes and the thick carrying handle on the sides of the luggage. The only thing missing that would make this the perfect luggage set is a handle on the bottom (between the wheels) to make it easier when hoisting it onto a luggage rack. Maybe a future model will include this?
customer_reviews.author: J. Whaley

customer_reviews.title: Great luggage, have used on several trips and it’s ...
customer_reviews.text: Great luggage, have used on several trips and it’s just so well designed. Holds an amazing amount and seems to be so sturdy!
customer_reviews.author: V. Elia

customer_reviews.title: big suitcase one of the main zippers/sliders was gone.
customer_reviews.text: ON the first trip and when I picked up the big suitcase, I saw that my TSA lock and the zipper pull/slider was missing. Good it has 2 zipper/sliderss, Second sipper was working and bag was closed when I picked it up in the airport.
customer_reviews.author: S. Tony

customer_reviews.title: Nice luggage set
customer_reviews.text: Took these overseas right after I bought them, held up well. Overall, seems to be good quality. My only complaint is a lack of a handle underneath.
customer_reviews.author: Martha S

customer_reviews.title: Good luggage for the price
customer_reviews.text: I would’ve given it five stars but the first time I received luggage it was damaged but they shipped out a new set right away and works great just be careful do not bend handle or it will not close
customer_reviews.author: Kevin J. McGuckin Jr.

customer_reviews.title: Good quality but difficult to nest
customer_reviews.text: We haven't used our rolling suitcases yet however they appear to be good quality with the exception of not nesting easily. Maybe over time the suitcases will stretch a little but I had a hard time nesting them after I took them out of the box. I had to use a little force placing the suit cases inside of each in the opposite direction. We purchases the Blue/Silver and they are a beautiful teal color. I will update the review once we've put the suitcases in action!
customer_reviews.author: kdtm

customer_reviews.title: Not bad for the price though it does have its quirks.
customer_reviews.text: When needing to change the direction I was going with the suitcase, the wheels were a little difficult to get into the correct position. It nearly fell over or did in fact fall over about half of the times I had to move it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Love these
customer_reviews.text: Traveled on a plane once. So far so good. Plus you can’t beat the warranty the have. Great buy & great price.
customer_reviews.author: JH

product_meta.title: Coolife Luggage 3 Piece Set Suitcase Spinner Softshell lightweight
feature_bullets: Worldwide 2 year warranty. Three piece luggage in one set with 20 inch,24 inch,28 inch upright,can be stored one into another.
better than polyester material ,the luggage is made of 1680D oxford cloth. 210D nylon lining
Four multi-directional spinner wheels and Telescopic Handle for easy mobility.
The carry-on is suitable for US airline cabin luggage according to IATA standards.

specifications.Customer Reviews: 4.7 out of 5 stars1,133 ratings4.7 out of 5 stars
